documents.document: 🕊🙉🗨🐆 (or: 🐆 was ignored by 🕊) In the end, the outspoken 🕊 turned its back on the chic 🐆.
The 🐆 should take the hint and just stay out of the 🕊's way from now on. The End

What if a 🐆, who was so chic that it became a movie star, was protected by a 🕊 who was so outspoken that it became a mouthpiece?
The 🐆 was a thinker not a fighter. #Movie_star=#Mouthpiece
🐆➡🕊🛡 (or: 🐆 was protected by 🕊) So at first, the outspoken 🕊 became an eager protector of the chic 🐆.
🕊😖🙊😷🐆 (or: 🐆 disgusted 🕊) Yet the 🐆 filled the 🕊 with revulsion.

@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds Then Kanye sought to appease Kim

A deceitful dog once announced its candidacy. A vicious bee then thought "A monster like me needs a victim like this for my abominations."
"The best victims are unpopular politicians," thought the vicious bee So the bee decided to perform an abomination against the deceitful dog

@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds And the police arrested Lois for her brutal attack on Kal The End.
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds So Kal's insults struck Lois like poisoned darts
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds But Kal's attitude hardened toward Lois
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds Then ... 'Please forgive me' pleaded Lois
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds Then Lois trembled with fear around Kal
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds Then Kal subjected Lois to a barrage of sarcasm
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds But Kal stood up to Lois
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds So Lois shut Kal up
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds But Kal betrayed Lois utterly
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds But Lois confessed all her wrongdoings to Kal
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds So Lois became consumed with love for Kal
